main event: On November 10, 1951, two to three very bright objects were observed in Rydal, Georgia, moving at high speed and changing course erratically.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 10 to 15 minutes., The objects made no noise during their appearance., Col. Cobb noted the sighting was consistent with other Air Force sightings in the same area., Heavy electrical storm activity was present at the time of the sighting., The objects disappeared suddenly after their erratic motion.
